text: 15:4 2 Atriviba 21:1-16; 2 Eghaghaniba 33:1-9Eghtɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, bizir kɨ Judabagh amizir kam baregh atiatigh dɨgavir kuram damigham. Kɨ garima, Hesekian otarim Manase, a Judan atrivimɨn ikia, Jerusalemɨn aven arazir bar kurabagh ami. Ezɨ bizir kɨ amir kam, a Manasen arazir kuram ikarvasi.”
